activateForFund(address).details: Unimplemented by default, can be overridden by the policy

params._encodedSettings: Encoded settings to apply to a fund

canDisable().details: False by default, can be overridden by the policy

returns.canDisable_: True if the policy can be disabled

params._assets: The assets for which to check the rule

updateFundSettings(address,bytes).details: Disallowed by default, can be overridden by the policy

validateRule(address,uint8,bytes).details: onlyPolicyManager validation not necessary, as state is not updated and no events are fired

params._encodedArgs: Encoded args with which to validate the rule

activateForFund(address).notice: Validates and initializes a policy as necessary prior to fund activation

addFundSettings(address,bytes).notice: Adds the initial policy settings for a fund

canDisable().notice: Whether or not the policy can be disabled

getListIdsForFund(address).notice: Gets the list ids used by a given fund

identifier().notice: Provides a constant string identifier for a policy

implementedHooks().notice: Gets the implemented PolicyHooks for a policy

passesRule(address,address[]).notice: Checks whether a particular condition passes the rule for a particular fund

updateFundSettings(address,bytes).notice: Updates the policy settings for a fund

validateRule(address,uint8,bytes).notice: Apply the rule with the specified parameters of a PolicyHook
